Artist is in despair, he realizes that nobody needs his help any longer, th=
ey actually never needed his help. The only one that ever retruned the favo=
r of his help is the only one he really ever helped, and that was Dinobot. =
He missed Dinobot, he was good and true, and Artist was not, he remembered.=
 Plintissa comforted him some, but he still felt terrible. Artist walked al=
ong. He thought about Plintissa, even though he wasn't away from her.

"Sor=
ry." Artist said to Plintissa. Plintissa didn't bother asking why Artist wa=
s apologizing. Artist smiled when Plintissa said something to him. He walke=
d back into the base and went into a CR Chamber, his arm hurt from punching=
 a wall earlier and he wanted to be repaired. Even though his arm was repai=
red later, he didn't come out, he and Plintissa needed time to think...
